education.program: Bachelor of Science in General Science (Physics, Chemistry)
details: General Science degree with a concentration in physics and chemistry.
Graduated with a 3.5 GPA.
Ongoing, expected completion in April 2026.
Certificate program focused on spatial data analysis, GIS, and geospatial technologies.
Current GPA: 3.8.
Used GIS to quantify stream-restoration impacts for reporting and decision support.
Collaborated with stakeholders to define analysis needs and communicate results.
Processed and tabulated lab results into clean templates to support contamination analysis.
Compared new results with historical datasets and guidelines to identify exceedances.
Wrote clear stakeholder-ready summaries with recommended next steps.
Managed listings, scheduling, and client communications; supported property showings.
